ai-anya-e1101n2:381_0: He was reborn amongst gods and humans (only) for a thousand aeons, which was like a thousand rebirths, which was like an rainy season.
ai-anya-e1101n2:381_1: Then he gave me a gift, and then gave it to the brahmin lady, saying: “Whoever, did you give me a gift?”
ai-anya-e1101n2:381_2: He was the lord of the gods, the Queen Many gods,
ai-anya-e1101n2:381_3: Then, in that battle, he saw his own life and saw his own life.
ai-anya-e1101n2:381_4: Having seen (that), he with his own hands, and after approaching the form of a young brāhmaṇa, he turned around the golden starting around the full moon, and establishing himself in the blessing of the gods, having destroyed his own residence, he returned to his own house, and choose seven days, he established human beings passing away,
ai-anya-e1101n2:381_5: Herein, a human being is indeed a human being.
ai-anya-e1101n2:381_6: That he had a feeble, having his weak-like body.
ai-anya-e1101n2:381_7: Then, on seeing the dead, the god, looking at it like this, and looking down on the eyes. Because of this, he saw a deity, he thought, “ anyone who has reached perfect self-control and so on, we will surely be reborn in a single stage of my own beauty,” and with the divine eyes, he gives his own form in the form of rebirth as Sakka, and so on.
ai-anya-e1101n2:384_0: Having drunk the people thinking: ‘This is what is well done,’
ai-anya-e1101n2:385_0: to make your friends and colleagues,
ai-anya-e1101n2:386_0: for praise those who are always seeking purity.
ai-anya-e1101n2:387_0: Should live depending on another, a group of ten.
ai-anya-e1101n2:388_0: The second sub-chapter on Nandiyas is finished.
